series.title: Village of Riverside Board of Trustees Meetings
series.shortDescription: Watch past Village of Riverside Board of Trustees Meetings!

episodes.title: Village of Riverside Board of Trustees: Regular Meeting, March 3, 2022
episodes.shortDescription: The Village of Riverside Board of Trustees Regular Meeting for March 3, 2022.
episodes.longDescription: The Village of Riverside Board of Trustees held a Regular Meeting on March 3, 2022. This video was produced by Riverside TV — Village of Riverside, Illinois.

series.title: Memories of Riverside
series.shortDescription: A series of conversations with long time Riverside residents!

episodes.title: Memories of Riverside: Don Farnham
episodes.longDescription: Riverside TV sits down with longtime Riverside resident Don Farnham. He talks about his time in World War II and later his life as a camera operator.

episodes.title: Memories of Riverside: JoAnne Kosey
episodes.longDescription: Riverside TV sits down with noted Riverside resident JoAnne Kosey. She talks about her time growing up in Riverside and how she has helped influence it's path!
